title: Humanizing Pedagogy Design for Online Science Classes: Critical Reflection and Inclusive Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Need to establish individualized feedback systems for project-based activities linked to science curricula

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze peers' opinions on online discussion boards and propose three or more improvement strategies
Learners can use mobile devices to document the scientific experiment process and then write a reflective journal entry of at least 500 characters.
Learners can collaboratively produce science project outcomes and complete presentation materials with peers from multicultural backgrounds using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
